scripts.docker-dev-up: docker compose up -d && sleep 1 && docker compose exec webapp npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.test: docker compose exec webapp npx vitest
scripts.db-studio: docker compose exec webapp npx prisma studio
scripts.db-push: docker compose exec webapp npx prisma db push
scripts.db-migrate: docker compose exec webapp npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db-reset: docker compose exec webapp npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db-seed: docker compose exec webapp npx prisma db seed
scripts.db-snapshot: . ./.env && docker compose exec postgres pg_dump -U $POSTGRES_USER -F c -b -v $POSTGRES_DB > ./temp/backup_file.dump
scripts.db-prod-deploy: . ./.env && export DATABASE_URL=$(echo $DATABASE_URL | sed 's/postgres:5432/localhost:5433/') && cd webapp && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db-prod-seed: . ./.env && export DATABASE_URL=$(echo $DATABASE_URL | sed 's/postgres:5432/localhost:5433/') && cd webapp && npx prisma db seed
